extension.summary: A modern, reactive frontend to control Kodi media center via WebSockets and JSON-RPC.
extension.description: Kodi Reactive is a web-based interface built with Angular and Ionic that allows users to remotely manage their Kodi media library and playback. It communicates with Kodi in real-time through WebSockets for live updates and a JSON-RPC REST API for library operations. The application supports browsing music and video collections, managing local playlists, controlling playback, and features both light and dark themes.
